item.title: publications
item.description: A list of my publications is given below, it’s usually fairly up to date. Alternatively, you can take a look at my Google Scholar profile, or my profile on any number of useless “academic profile” websites (listed at the end of the page). {% bibliography %} Other “Academic Profile” Pages: ORCiD ResearchGate Mendeley ResearcherID academia.edu
